title: Placeholders
description: When you install AnimatedMenu on your server, you will get a few extra placeholders to use
For each of the below placeholders, use %animatedmenu_<id>% where <id> is the text in bold

values.name: motd_<id>
values.description: Returns the motd of a server specified in @{config.md#connections|Connections}

values.name: onlineplayers_<id>
values.description: Returns the online players of a server specified in @{config.md#connections|Connections}

values.name: maxplayers_<id>
values.description: Returns the max players of a server specified in @{config.md#connections|Connections}

values.name: status_<id>
description: Checks the online status of a server specified in @{config.md#connections|Connections}
In the connection's section, use 'online' for an online server, and 'offline' for an offline server

values.name: motdcheck_<id>
description: Returns different values depending on the motd of a @{config.md#connections|Connections} server
You can use keys in the section to specify the server motd, and values as the result
Use 'default' for when no matching motd is found, and 'offline' for when the server is offline

values.name: worldplayers_<world>
values.description: Returns the amount of players in <world>

values.name: shownplayers_<world>
values.description: Returns the amount of players in <world> that are not vanished using essentials
